Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Human Soldier', 3: 'Sir, report! We found two little girls!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: 'Yes, sir. They were fighting with the Corrupted before we arrived here, sir.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: "They're slightly injured, but mostly they look unwell from malnutrition.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Bring them back to base for medical care.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'According to our tests, the affinity of your bodies to Tantalum-193 is extremely high.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'This means you two have the chance to become Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Yes. Having a body made of entirely different materials, while still maintaining your human consciousness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Both your body and consciousness will no longer be harmed by the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "This is the last hope of humanity against the virus. And it's the... final chance we all have.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We... can only live in this world...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "No, there's still a place in this world that is untainted by the virus...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I know what you want to say...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Our mission, is to maximize the chances of victory for humanity—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'She, will be an "ember" in the coming darkness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Only an innumerable... infinite expanse of embers, may guide humanity through this darkness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'To win this war... We must bear this sin.', 4: '1'}
